text: XFX has lowered the price for its flagship AMD GPU.  The MERC 310 version of the Radeon RX 7900 XTX from XFX’s Speedster series is now available at a reduced price of $799, over $170 cheaper than its current official list price. The card released was launched on December 2022 at $1,199, but has already been seen at $892 in November. The new price is no doubt much lower. UPDATE: The deal has ended Amazon (affiliate link) The RX 7900 XTX presently holds the title of the fastest SKU in AMD’s lineup, boasting a full Navi 31 GPU and 24GB of memory. This particular model finds itself in competition with NVIDIA’s GeForce RTX 4080 graphics card, which is expected to be succeeded by a SUPER variant by the end of this month, promising slightly improved performance.   XFX 7900XTX MERC 310 price, Source: PCPartPicker  While NVIDIA has not officially disclosed the pricing for their upcoming cards, there is a high likelihood that existing RTX 4080 models will experience a reduction in price, adding to the competitive dynamics in the market. The promotion currently available on Amazon might be a time-limited offer, as it has not been mirrored by other retailers at this time. However, this could potentially signal the impending price reductions for the Radeon RX7900 XTX series across various retailers.
